comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All praise to Thee, my God, this night, for all the blessings of the light. Keep me, O keep me, King of kings, beneath Thine own almighty wings.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Forgive me, Lord, for Thy dear Son, the ill that I this day have done, that with the world, myself, and Thee, I, ere I sleep, at peace may be.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O may my soul on Thee repose, and may sweet sleep mine eyelids close; sleep, that may me more vig'rous make, to serve my God, when I awake.

verse.name: v4
